meaningMnemonic: <kanji>I</kanji> get <kanji>ridiculed</kanji> a lot, but it makes me have really strong <vocabulary>endurance</vocabulary>. If you get picked on a lot, just say, "I have <vocabulary>patience</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>self control</vocabulary>, and I can make it through this."
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
